name: Gallant Virus
description:
---- This game has been updated since the game jam ----

This game is made for the ZahranW's Mini Jam 128.

Your goal is to completely infect your host, from the bottom to the top. Although there are white blood cells in your way, you've got a sword to assist you. How you, a single virus, got that sword is beyond me, but hey, no one's stopping you from using it.

Controls:

LeftA or left arrow keyLeft stick left or D-pad leftRightD or right arrow keyLeft stick right or D-pad rightUpW or up arrow keyLeft stick up or D-pad upDownS or down arrow keyLeft stick down or D-pad downSwing swordSpaceA (Nintendo)PauseEscape key+ or - (Nintendo)SelectSpaceA (Nintendo)

Note that the Android version requires a controller.
